entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
